essentials.name: Clothing
essentials.desc: Check the weather forecast in advance. Rochester's weather can be unpredictable. The conference is two days, so bring at least two pairs of underwear.

essentials.name: Materials
essentials.desc: We recommend that you bring a sketchbook with a writing utensil, along with your smartphone.

essentials.name: Cameras
essentials.desc: Cameras are welcome at most events.

essentials.name: Your work
essentials.desc: There are scheduled portfolio reviews and networking events. We suggest that you bring work samples and business cards.
